revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: --- from Aurelius/Flavius/Valerius Antonius Theodoros the most distinguished catholicus (?) and magister rei privatae. As the sale of estates belonging to the fisces and of land parcels --- falling to the most sacred fiscus is, according to custom, coming to be held here in the Capitolium surely on the 11th day before the calends of September (=22. viii), it was necessary to make it clear to all through this proclamation that all those who are willing to make a purchase from the most sacred fiscus should address themselves at my office and ... on the same day, in order that they do (not?) make...clear.

listBibl.bibl: Worp, K. A. - Nielsen, B. "New Papyri from the New York University Collection: IV". ZPE 149 (2004) 105-6 (Nr. 40) Naphtali Lewis, JJP 15, 159-60, 1965 -- 9883
